Description: Ostracon, section (two fragments joined) of the upper-body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of red-painted Coptic characters.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394255) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394255)
